T game.service.ServiceLocator.GetService< T > ( )[inline]
Retrieves a service of the specified type from the service collection.
Template Parameters
T
The type of the service to be retrieved.
Returns
An instance of the requested service of type T .
This method attempts to retrieve a service from a collection of registered services using its type as the key. If the service is found, it is cast to the specified type and returned. If the service is not registered, a KeyNotFoundException is caught, and an ApplicationException is thrown with a message indicating that the requested service is not registered. This method is useful in dependency injection scenarios where services are registered and resolved at runtime.
Exceptions
ApplicationException
Thrown when the requested service is not registered in the service collection.
RegisterService< T >() RegisterService< T >game.service.ServiceLocator game.service.ServiceLocatorRegisterService< T >
void game.service.ServiceLocator.RegisterService< T > (T service)[inline]
Registers a service of type T in the service collection.
Template Parameters
T
The type of the service to be registered, which must implement IService.
Parameters
service
The instance of the service to be registered.
This method allows for the registration of a service within a dependency injection container. The service is stored in a dictionary using its type as the key, enabling later retrieval of the service instance when needed. The generic type parameter T enforces that only types implementing the IService interface can be registered, ensuring type safety and consistency in the service collection. Type Constraints
T:IService
